articles.title: Kim Jong Il Gives Field Guidance to Newly-Built Taedonggang Tile Factory
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Gives Field Guidance to Newly-Built Taedonggang Tile Factory
Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il gave field guidance to the newly-built Taedonggang Tile Factory.
					 Being briefed on the factory in front of a big map showing its panoramic view, Kim Jong Il went round its interior and exterior to learn in detail about the construction of the factory and production there.
					
					  Looking at the structures where a high level of quality has been ensured in construction and watching the production processes from where various kinds of quality building materials are being churned out without let-up, he expressed great satisfaction over the fact that the soldier builders have built the modern factory in such a manner as to let it win the admiration of the posterity. He highly appreciated their feats. 
					
					  It is a very gratifying that the factory has established a production system strictly relying on locally available raw materials, he said, adding that the successful endeavors being made by all domains of the national economy including the metal industry to put them on a Juche basis fully reflect the unshakable faith of the Korean people to build a great prosperous and powerful nation on this land by their own efforts, resources and technology without fail.
					
					  Looking at tiles and ceramic tiles of various sizes and colors for diverse use, he was very pleased to see the officials, workers and technicians of the factory mass-producing quality building materials in the spirit of devoted service for the people. He appreciated their efforts. 
					
					  He set forth important tasks to be fulfilled by the factory, noting that it has an important role to play in developing the nation's building materials industry.
					
					  Every construction site in cities and villages requires more quality building materials, he said, underlining the need for the workers of the factory to effect a fresh turn in the production to satisfactorily meet the increasing demand for building materials.
					
					  He stressed the need to actively apply advanced technology and steadily boost the level of technical skill of workers in order to steadily improve the quality of building materials which play an important role in ensuring high quality of structures and making cities look more beautiful.
					
					  The completion of the second-phase project would help turn the factory into a large building materials production base which produces varieties of modern building materials, he noted, indicating an orientation and ways for completing the next-phase project earlier than scheduled. 
					
					  He had a photo session with labor innovators of the factory.
					
					  He was accompanied by Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the WPK Central Committee, Pak Nam Gi and Jang Song Thaek, department directors of the C.C., the WPK, and KPA Generals Hyon Chol Hae and Ri Myong Su.

articles.title: Congratulations to PM of Cameroon
articles.content:
Congratulations to PM of Cameroon
Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Il, premier of the DPRK, Monday sent a congratulatory message to Yang Yunji Philemon upon his appointment as Prime Minister of Cameroon.
					The message wished the Prime Minister success in his work for the development and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Gifts to Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Gifts to Kim Jong Il 
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by the visiting State Academy Beryozka Dancing Troupe of Russia Named after N.S. Nadezhdina.
					 The gift was handed to an official concerned on Monday by Mira Koltsova, head of the troupe.
					
					 The leader also received gifts from the head of the troupe and its Manager Sergei Azovski.

articles.title: Many Scientific and Technological Problems Solved in DPRK
articles.content:
Many Scientific and Technological Problems Solved in DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- The Hamhung Branch of the State Academy of Sciences of the DPRK has solved many scientific and technological problems, thus making a great contribution to the building of a great, prosperous and powerful nation.
					 The branch has succeeded in making new distemper paints with raw materials of the country and made new vinalon fiber, precision filter matter, various medical matters, electronic matter and adhesives from intermediate product of vinalon.
					
					 It has solved scientific and technological problems for manufacturing sodium carbonate with local raw materials so as to mass-produce it and developed and introduced the technology for producing salt by an industrial method.
					
					 It has researched and introduced to production carbon, rubber and plastic materials which had been imported from foreign countries, thus making it possible to localize them.
					
					 Successes were made in inventing new dyestuffs, efficacious insecticides, herbicides and additives for poultry fodder.
					
					 It has directed much effort to the research into the ultra-modern science and technology according to the requirements of the new century, through which it has developed various nano materials and advanced chemical materials.
					
					General Secretary Kim Jong Il visited the branch some time ago and highly appreciated the feats of the scientists and technicians there, saying that they had rendered distinguished services to the development of the Juche-based chemical industry.

articles.title: DPRK, Dignified with Songun
articles.content:
DPRK, Dignified with Songun
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- The Democratic People's Republic of Korea, which has been called along with the words of hero, Chollima and Juche last century, is now displaying its dignity all over the world along with the name of Songun.
					 The world revolutionary progressives call the DPRK Songun Korea.
					
					 In the 1990s, the Korean people had to endure the sorrowful demise of President Kim Il Sung and undergo trials and difficulties caused by the collapse of various socialist countries, natural disasters for consecutive years and the persistent moves of the imperialists to isolate and stifle the DPRK.
					
					Since General Secretary Kim Jong Il visited a dwarf pine tree post early on the New Year's Day of Juche 84 (1995), he has inspected one unit of the Korean People's Army after another.
					
					 Under his wise leadership the KPA has been strengthened into a strong invincible revolutionary army prepared well politically, ideologically and in military technique, firmly defending socialism and creating an example in economy, culture and other realms with the might.
					
					 The servicepersons have constructed the Anbyon Youth Power Station, Pyongyang-Hyangsan Sightseeing Highway, Chongryu Bridge, Kumnung Tunnel No. 2 and other grand monumental edifices and modern factories including catfish farm and chicken farm. They have thus laid a solid foundation for developing the economy at a leaping pace.
					
					 The art festivals of KPA servicepersons and performances of art groups of servicemen's families have made the militant spirit and revolutionary zeal pervaded the whole society.
					
					 The soldier-culture is being popularized in the country as a model of the socialist culture of life.
					
					 The Songun Korea is displaying to the full its strong national power turning impossibility into possibility, misfortune into fortune and unfavorable circumstances into favorable ones in the teeth of the persistent anti-DPRK moves of the U.S. and its followers.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak's Reckless Remarks under Fire
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak's Reckless Remarks under Fire
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- Some days ago, traitor Lee Myung Bak of south Korea, appeared at the inaugural ceremony of the 14th-term "Advisory Council for Democracy and Peaceful Unification" to slander the DPRK with such conventional phrases as "provocation" and "threat." And he talked nonsense that "they would put straight the south-north relations though this process may be difficult and sluggish" and that "the north should no longer aggravate the situation."
					 Commenting on his imprudent remarks, Rodong Sinmun Monday dismisses them as a last-ditch effort to evade the blame for deteriorated inter-Korean relations and preposterous sophism intended to distort the reality.
					
					 The traitor has no right to talk about the inter-Korean relations, the daily says, and goes on:
					
					 He is utterly indifferent to the development of the north-south relations as he has sought only division, instead of reunification, and the interests of a handful of traitors, instead of those of the nation.
					
					 If Lee had not denied the inter-Korean declarations and their spirit nor adopted he as a policy to make confrontation with fellow countrymen, the inter-Korean relations which had developed favorably would not have been driven into the worst crisis as they are today.
					
					 It is the stark reality that the group of traitors declared its full participation in the PSI, little different from war declaration, unreasonably slandering the DPRK's exercise of independent rights and have taken the lead in kicking up a racket of international "sanctions" on the DPRK in league with foreign forces.
					
					 Traitor Lee Myung Bak can never hide its wild design for national division and inter-Korean confrontation, the daily stresses, adding:
					
					 Though he is a master-hand at shifting any blame on to others, Lee can never evade the blame for having driven the inter-Korean relations to total collapse and brought the situation of the Korean Peninsula to the brink of war.

articles.title: True Aim of Japanese Reactionaries' Trumpeting about Denuclearization Disclosed
articles.content:
True Aim of Japanese Reactionaries' Trumpeting about Denuclearization Disclosed
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- Murata, former vice-minister of Foreign Affairs of Japan, in a recent press interview, disclosed that there was a secret accord in which the Japanese government promised to connive at the port call of the U.S. forces' warship carrying nuclear weapons and passage through its territorial waters during the revision of the "Japan-U.S security pact" in 1960. 
					 Nevertheless, the Japanese reactionary ruling quarters asserted that they don't think this would be "any shock to other countries" and "Japan remains unchanged in its stand on 'denuclearization'".
					
					 Japanese diplomat Yukiya Amano elected general director of the International Atomic Energy Agency in a recent press interview talked nonsense that "Japan has made utmost efforts in the field of the nuclear non-proliferation in the post war period. 
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 The denuclearization touted by the Japanese reactionaries is no more than a camouflaged peace artifice and a nuclear hide-and-seek.
					
					 Citing facts to prove that Japan has long pursued the development of nuclear weapons, the commentary goes on:
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries are, however, labeling others "nuclear criminals" like a thief crying "Stop the thief!"
					
					 Japan has so many flaws as far as the nuclear issue is concerned but is behaving as if it were "an international nuclear judge." This is a deception and mockery of the international community. 
					
					 With nothing can Japan cover up its true colors as a militarist and its nuclear ambition.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries would be well advised to stop playing a clumsy farce and do away with its blemished conscience and ambition to emerge a nuclear power.

articles.title: S. Korean Youth and Students Called upon to Turn out in Struggle to Bring down Lee Myung Bak Regime
articles.content:
S. Korean Youth and Students Called upon to Turn out in Struggle to Bring down Lee Myung Bak Regime 
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- The Youth and Students Solidarity for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration of south Korea on July 10 made public immediate action slogans calling for turning out in the struggle to force traitor Lee Myung Bak to step down.
					 The slogans demanded war maniac Lee step down as he has been engrossed in inciting confrontation with fellow countrymen through the "full participation" in the PSI in collusion with the U.S. and Japan and has stepped up the moves for a nuclear war while begging the U.S. to provide "a nuclear umbrella" to south Korea.
					
					 The slogans called for bringing down Lee's anti-reunification "government" which totally denied the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and bringing to light his plot to close the Kaesong Industrial Zone and his anti-reunification nature.
					
					 The slogans stressed the need to bring the Lee "government" to collapse as it drives people to death through fascist dictatorship while fanning up an atmosphere for a nuclear war of aggression against the DPRK and inciting confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					 To force Lee to step down is the only way out, the slogans said, calling upon all the people to bring earlier an independent and democratic society through the unity of all the people.
					
					 The preparatory committee of the students committee of the youth and students solidarity released an appeal on July 9 calling on the youth and students to turn out in popular resistance against Lee Myung Bak and dictatorship with extraordinary determination.
					
					 Referring to the fierce struggle now underway across south Korea to eliminate Lee Myung Bak dictatorial forces which go against the people's mindset, the appeal asserted the need to throw overboard the dictatorial forces through mass resistance under the uplifted banner of the struggle against Lee Myung Bak and dictatorship.

articles.title: Moves of U.S. and Lee Myung Bak Group to Escalate Confrontation with DPRK Blasted
articles.content:
Moves of U.S. and Lee Myung Bak Group to Escalate Confrontation with DPRK Blasted
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Zhongnan Regional Association of the General Association of Koreans in China issued a statement on July 4 in denunciation of the reckless moves of  the United States and the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK. 
					 The statement recalled that during his recent junket to the U.S. pro-American lackey Lee Myung Bak disclosed his sinister aim to stand in confrontation with the DPRK to the last, backed by his master, and blustering that he would not rule out even a war against it. 
					
					 No desperate efforts of the reactionaries of history can ever stop the DPRK's uninterrupted victorious advance of its just cause, the statement declared, calling upon the people from all walks of life in south Korea to intensify the struggle against the U.S., war and Lee Myung Bak.
					
					 The group of traitors should halt at once its futile confrontation with the DPRK and swim with the dynamic trend of reunification under the banner of "By our nation itself", aware that national cooperation alone can guarantee a future, the statement stressed.

articles.title: Solidarity with Korean People Expressed in Britain
articles.content:
Solidarity with Korean People Expressed in Britain
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held in London on June 27 under the sponsorship of the British Coordinating Committee of Friends of Korea on the occasion of the month of international solidarity with the Korean people.
					 Attending the meeting were figures of political parties and organizations including the New Communist Party of Britain, the Communist Party (Marxist-Leninist), the Revolutionary Communist Party (Marxist-Leninist), the Socialist Labour Party and the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and popular masses of UK and personages of the European Society for the Study of the Juche Idea.
					
					 Speeches were made at the meeting.
					
					 Keith Bennet, deputy director-general of the European Society for the Study of the Juche Idea, said that intensifying the movement for solidarity with the Korean people presents itself as a very important matter now that the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces have become all the more pronounced in their moves to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 Andy Brooks, general secretary of the Central Committee of the New Communist Party, and Ella Rule, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party (Marxist-Leninist), noted with appreciation that not only the DPRK but developing countries are proud of the DPRK's launch of satellite with its own efforts and technology and of its successful second nuclear test, adding that bright is the future of the world socialist movement as long as there is the DPRK.
					
					 A resolution was adopted there.
					
					 Slashing at the imperialists' campaign of accusation against the DPRK, the resolution dismissed the U.S. and other imperialist forces keen on nuclear blackmail and aggression as threats to the world peace and security.
					
					 It called for intensifying the movement for solidarity with the Korean people in their struggle to foil the anti-DPRK moves on the part of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet clique and reunify the country.
					
					 Criticizing the British government's behavior over the adoption of the UNSC's "Resolution 1874", the resolution stressed the need for various political parties and organizations to exert efforts to develop friendly relations with the Korean people.

articles.title: Anniversary of Demise of Kim Il Sung Observed Abroad
articles.content:
Anniversary of Demise of Kim Il Sung Observed Abroad
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- Lectures and film shows took place in South Africa, India and Iran on July 2 on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Put on display in the venues of the events were celebrated works of the President and General Secretary Kim Jong Il, photos showing their undying exploits and books and photos introducing the validity of the Songun politics and the advantages of the Korean-style socialist system.
					
					 The chairperson of the Mahlambandlophy, Pretoria City, Branch of the African National Congress of South Africa in a lecture said that the President pursued the most popular policy of loving care all his life.
					
					 The chairman of the Indian Youth Group for the Study of Works of Comrade Kim Il Sung in a lecture noted that the universal free medical care system and the free compulsory education system have been enforced in the DPRK and it became the first tax-free country in the world thanks to the President's idea of believing in people as in Heaven.
					
					 The secretary general of the International Taekwon-Do Association in Iran stressed that Kim Il Sung is always alive in the hearts of not only the Korean people but also the world's progressive people for his immortal feats although he passed away.
					
					 He expressed belief that the Korean people would surely attain the magnificent objective of building a great prosperous and powerful nation under the Songun politics of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The participants in the film shows watched Korean films "Arms of Korea" and "Faith of Korea."

articles.title: Juche Idea Study Group Formed in Democratic Congo
articles.content:
Juche Idea Study Group Formed in Democratic Congo
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- A Juche idea study group of the Working Citizens' Association of Democratic Congo was formed with due ceremony in Kinshasa on July 3.
					 The chairman of the group was elected.
					
					 Addressing the ceremony, Rohekele Andre, president of the Working Citizens' Association of Democratic Congo, said that the group should deeply study the great idea and widely disseminate it and fully support the Korean people's just cause for national reunification.

articles.title: Centenary of Birth of Kim Il Sung to Be Commemorated in Kuwait
articles.content:
Centenary of Birth of Kim Il Sung to Be Commemorated in Kuwait
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- A Kuwaiti preparatory committee was inaugurated on July 4 to commemorate the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Yousef Al Amiri, president of the Kuwait House of Works who is chairman of the Kuwait-DPRK Friendship Association, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.

articles.title: Capital Idea for Preventing Cold-weather Damage
articles.content:
Capital Idea for Preventing Cold-weather Damage
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung visited a vegetable greenhouse of a co-op farm in Sonbong County (then) while giving field guidance to North Hamgyong Province towards the end of May Juche 70 (1981).
					 He asked an official to what extent the atmospheric temperature went down in this area colder than Pyongyang.
					
					 The official said that the temperature fell down to 22 degrees C below zero, and according to the experience in greenhouse farming for several years, it was possible to solve the problem of low atmospheric temperature but the low soil temperature caused by the high water level had bad influence on the vegetable cultivation.
					
					 After being wrapped in thought for a while, the President said that if the vegetable production was badly influenced by the low soil temperature of the greenhouse, they should dig ditches in front and in the rear of the greenhouse, which might prevent the soil temperature from going down in winter.
					
					 His words awakened the officials.
					
					 In fact, they were plagued by the low soil temperature in the winter vegetable cultivation.
					
					 The President found instantly a way out for overcoming it.
					
					 The instructions of the President on digging ditches in the front and in the rear of the greenhouse and lowering the underground water level below the greenhouse were a capital idea that made it possible to put the winter vegetable cultivation on a normal track.
					
					 That day, the President instructed officials that the brook in the rear of the greenhouse should be dug two meters deep.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun comenta disparates de Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun comenta disparates de Lee Myung Bak 
Pyongyang, 13 de julio (ATCC) -- Hace poco, en la "ceremonia inaugural" del 14o periodo del "Consejo Consultivo por la Democracia y la Reunificacion Pacifica", el traidor Lee Myung Bak volvio a insultar a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea con unas palabras rutinarias como "provocacion" y "amenaza". 
					  Insatisfecho con esto, dijo absurdamente que "aunque fuera dificil y paulatino, arreglaria las relaciones Sur-Norte" y que "el Norte no deberia empeorar por mas tiempo la situacion". 
					
					  En un comentario individual difundido este lunes, el diario Rodong Sinmun califica ese discurso frivolo del traidor Lee de ultimo esfuerzo desesperado por eludir la responsabilidad por el empeoramiento de las relaciones Norte-Sur y de sofisteria descarada que distorsiona la realidad. 
					
					  El traidor Lee, que persigue la division nacional y los intereses de un punado de los vendepatrias, no tiene ni la minima calificacion para hablar de las relaciones Norte-Sur ni tiene la voluntad de desarrollarlas, senala el comentarista y continua: 
					
					  Si el traidor Lee no hubiera negado las declaraciones conjuntas Norte-Sur y su espiritu ni politizado la confrontacion fratricida, las relaciones intercoreanas, que se desarrollaban favorablemente, no se habrian caido en la coyuntura tan critica de hoy.
					
					  En realidad, la banda del traidor Lee declaro la participacion total en la "Iniciativa de Seguridad contra la Proliferacion (PSI en ingles)" cuestionando el ejercicio de derechos soberanos por parte de la RPDC, y se pone al frente de la campana internacional para aplicar la "sancion" contra ella en contubernio con las fuerzas extranjeras. 
					
					  El traidor Lee nunca podra ocultar sus artimanas anti-reunificacion y su ambicion de enfrentarse con la RPDC. 
					
					  Aunque el fuera maestro en imputar a otros las responsabilidades, no podra hacerlo en el caso de la ruptura total de las relaciones intercoreanas y la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana al borde de la guerra.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun revela designio de "desnuclearizacion" de Japon
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun revela designio de "desnuclearizacion" de Japon
Pyongyang, 13 de julio (ATCC) -- El exviceministro de Relaciones Exteriores de Japon, Murata, en una entrevista con un periodico sostenida hace poco, revelo que hubo un documento secreto de que el gobierno japones habia permitido la entrada en puerto japones y el paso por las aguas territoriales del pais isleno de los buques de las tropas yanquis cargados de armas nucleares cuando se discutia la enmienda del "tratado de seguridad Japon-EE.UU." en 1960.
					Sin embargo, la capa dominante de reaccionarios japoneses habla mucho de que eso "no daria ningun impacto a otros paises", "es invariable la posicion de la  de Japon" y otras cosas similares.
					
					   E incluso Yukiya Amano del Japon quien adquirio hace poco el puesto de director general de la Organizacion Internacional de Energia Atomica, en una rueda de prensa, dijo absurdamente que "Japon ha venido haciendo maximos esfuerzos en el dominio de no proliferacion nuclear de posguerra".
					
					Tal "desnuclearizacion" de que hablan tanto los reaccionarios japoneses no pasa de ser camuflaje de la paz y escondite nuclear.
					
					Senala asi el rotativo Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual difundido este lunes y prosigue:
					
					Hace mucho tiempo que el pais isleno ha perseguido el desarrollo de armas nucleares.
					
					Pero, los reaccionarios japoneses tratan de tildar a la RPDC del "delincuente nuclear" al igual que el ladron levanta primero el palo.
					
					Japon, que tiene muchos defectos en cuanto al problema nuclear, pretende actuar como "juez del asunto nuclear internacional", lo cual es engano y burla a la sociedad internacional. 
					
					El pais isleno no puede ocultar jamas su naturaleza militarista ni ambicion nuclear.
					
					Los reaccionarios japoneses deben abstenerse de su astucia torpe, vil intencion y ambicion de convertirse en una potencia nuclear.

articles.title: Corea soluciona muchos problemas cientifico-tecnicos
articles.content:
Corea soluciona muchos problemas cientifico-tecnicos
 Pyongyang, 13 de julio (ATCC) -- La Filial de Hamhung de la Academia Estatal de Ciencias de Corea contribuye activamente a la construccion de la gran potencia prospera solucionando numerosos problemas cientifico-tecnicos.
					  Recientemente, produjo nuevos materiales de pintura para la parte exterior del edificio que se apoyan en las materias primas domesticas y seguidamente invento con los productos intermediarios de vinalon la nueva fibra del genero y los materiales de filtro de precision, medico, electronico y adhesivo.
					
					  Tambien, realizo la industrializacion de su produccion de carbonato de soda al resolver el problema cientifico-tecnico para producirlo con materias primas criollas y desarrollo la tecnica de produccion de sal segun el metodo industrial.
					
					  Al investigar e introducir los materiales de carbono, goma y resina, permitio utilizar muchos materiales nacionales.
					
					  Tambien, invento nuevo tinte, la insecticida y herbicida con alta eficiencia y los materiales anexos para los piensos avicolas.
					
					  Al prestar la debida atencion a la investigacion de ciencias y tecnicas de punta conforme a la demanda del nuevo siglo, desarrollo varios materiales de nano y de quimica de punta.
					
					   Hace poco, el Dirigente Kim Jong Il  visito dicha filial donde evaluo altamente las proezas de los cientificos y tecnicos diciendo que la filial hizo un gran aporte al desarrollo de la autoctona industria quimica del pais.

articles.title: Gran Bretana: mitin solidario con pueblo coreano
articles.content:
Gran Bretana: mitin solidario con pueblo coreano
Pyongyang, 13 de julio (ATCC) -- Con motivo del mes de solidaridad internacional con el pueblo coreano, tuvo lugar el 27 de junio en Londres un mitin bajo el auspicio del Comite Britanico de Coordinacion de Amigos de Corea.
					  En la ocasion estuvieron presentes las personalidades de los partidos politicos y entidades de Gran Bretana como el Nuevo Partido Comunista, el Partido Comunista (Marxista-Leninista), el Partido Comunista Revolucionario (Marxista-Leninista), el Partido Laborista Socialista y la Asociacion de Estudio de la Politica de Songun (priorizacion militar), etc., y otros habitantes.
					
					  Igualmente, se distinguian las personalidades de la Sociedad Europea para el Estudio de la Idea Juche.
					
					  El vicepresidente de esta sociedad, Keith Bennet, subrayo que intensificar el movimiento solidario con el pueblo coreano es un problema muy importante dado que ahora se tornan mas brutales que nunca las maniobras de las fuerzas aliadas imperialistas cuyo cabecillo es Estados Unidos para atropellar a la RPDC.
					
					  El secretario general del Comite Central del Nuevo Partido Comunista, Andy Brooks, y el vicepresidente del CC del Partido Comunista (Marxista-Leninista), Ella Rule, dijeron que el exito logrado por Corea en el lanzamiento de satelite artificial y la segunda prueba nuclear, ejecutados con las fuerzas y tecnicas propias, pone orgullosos no solo a ella sino tambien a los paises en vias de desarrollo.
					
					  Elogiaron que gracias a Corea, es prometedor el futuro del movimiento socialista mundial.
					
					  En el mitin fue aprobada la resolucion.
					
					  Este documento condena la demagogia sobre Corea de los imperialistas y califica a EE.UU. y las fuerzas imperialistas, que suelen chantajear y agredir con armas nucleares, de amenaza a la paz y seguridad del mundo.
					
					  Prosigue que se intensificaria el movimiento solidario con el pueblo coreano que lucha por reunificar el pais frustrando las maniobras anti-RPDC de EE.UU. y la banda titere del Sur de Corea.
					
					  Condena el procedimiento del gobierno britanico durante la aprobacion de la "resolucion no. 1874" del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU y exhorta a varios partidos politicos y entidades a esforzarse por desarrollar las relaciones de amistad con el pueblo coreano.
